name: Area 101
description:
Fight down aliens in many numerous worlds!

There are 3 game modes. Adventure, Survival, and Versus!

Adventure: Go along many levels as you can, and try to eliminate all of alien life! This can also save your data!

Survival: Survive as long as you can!

Versus: 2 PLAYERS REQUIRED! 2 players fight in many numerous maps! One are the guards, while the other one are aliens.
